name: Rot Waits for No One
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 52 - Theme: Harvest

Your organic farm is at risk of bankruptcy! 

In this cozy (ish) farm manager, plant seeds, harvest crops before they rot and deliver hand made boxes to your petty demanding clients.

In each level, plant and harvest different traditional and non-traditional in-season crops.

The review meter must not be overlooked - if you have too many bad reviews in a season, clients will review-bomb your business, and you will go bankrupt. Have fun!

Tutorial: Team:

Milo - Game Design, Programming & Music

Giulia - Game Design & Art
